Text: ETS Hedged and Open PositionsFinancial Exposure PositionsNote We have changed the correlation of the Transwesterns hedges to the same indexEl Paso Permian that the derivatives were transacted We feel it is appropriate to make this correlation change due to managements anticipation to make the sales at an El Paso Permian index Due to this change TW has a perfect correlation therefore the associated Value at Risk will be zero

ETS Hedged and Open PositionsFinancial Exposure PositionsNote We have excluded all Transportation Service Contracts from the calculation of authorized limits While some Transportation Service Contracts have price risk we currently do not have any that meet the definition of a derivative per FAS If there are any questions regarding this change please contact Dan Fancler

RE TWSpeculative Deals Jan Revenue Cc I made the following entry to accrue for the marketing support payment GAOther AP Traderd Party When the payment is ready to be made the wire should be coded to AP Traderd Party If there are any questions please let me know Thanks Debbie From Tracy nronXgate on PM To Dan FanclerET NRON cc Pallavi nronXgate Debbie MoseleyET NRON Subject RE TWSpeculative Deals Jan Revenue Where do we usually accrue for these types of payments Original Message From Fancler Dan Sent Wednesday April PM To Geaccone Tracy Cc Goradia Pallavi Moseley Debbie Subject RE TWSpeculative Deals Jan Revenue Debbie accrue a liability for a market support payment to Southwestern Gas for I assume you will charge TWs marketing cost center Dan Fancler From Tracy nronXgate on AM To Pallavi nronXgate Dan FanclerET NRON cc Subject RE TWSpeculative Deals Jan Revenue We need to set the reserve up for the full Original Message From Goradia Pallavi Sent Wednesday April AM To Fancler Dan Cc Geaccone Tracy Subject TWSpeculative Deals Jan Revenue In January Transwestern had revenue from speculative deals Please set up a reserve for this amount in March as this will be offset by an unbudgeted market support payment to Southwest Gas Corporation in December of Thanks Palu x
